snippet.title: The Hive - Command the Swarm | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The Hive is a strategy game with RPG elements where you assume command as the insectoid hive mind. Set in a vast, ancient underworld filled with forgotten civilizations, colossal creatures, and untold mysteries, your journey is one of survival, evolution, and uncovering the secrets of a lost world.

As your colony grows, so does your understanding of the ruins scattered across New Eden, revealing a tragic history and a glimpse of what lies beyond. In this hostile yet beautiful landscape, danger and discovery go hand in hand, and every choice could shape the fate of your swarm.

Steam

https://store.steampowered.com/app/325730/The_Hive/

https://aksetaka.bandcamp.com/album/the-hive-original-soundtrack

https://skydome.fi
